agricraft.tooltip.condition.botania_mana: This plant can not grow without mana
description.agricraft.botania.black_myst: A beautiful flower that is as dark as the night.
description.agricraft.botania.blue_mysti: A beautiful flower that is as blue as the sea.
description.agricraft.botania.brown_myst: A beautiful flower that is as brown as the dirt.
description.agricraft.botania.cyan_mysti: A beautiful flower of indeterminate color, being both green and blue.
description.agricraft.botania.gray_mysti: A beautiful flower, albeit rather non-descript.
description.agricraft.botania.green_myst: This flower seems to be envious of its other cousins with better descriptions.
description.agricraft.botania.light_blue: A beautiful flower that is blue as the sky on a sunny day.
description.agricraft.botania.light_gray: A beautiful flower, albeit even more non-descript than its cousin, the Mystical Gray Flower.
description.agricraft.botania.lime_mysti: I wonder if this flower would taste sour?
description.agricraft.botania.magenta_my: A beautiful flower, of color which my printer is always out.
description.agricraft.botania.orange_mys: A beautiful flower with a fiery disposition.
description.agricraft.botania.pink_mysti: A truly beautiful flower, emanating the throes of a powerful primal force.
description.agricraft.botania.purple_mys: A beautiful flower with a regal color, it certainly is of the royal lineage.
description.agricraft.botania.red_mystic: A beautiful flower with a sanguine color.
